execution_plan.description: Retrieve all orders from the EU sales database with total_eur > 100 that were updated/placed during the previous calendar month, including customer contact and country information by joining to the customers table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.id AS order_id, o.customer_id, o.total_eur, o.updated_at AS order_timestamp, o.coupon_code, c.email AS customer_email, c.full_name AS customer_name, c.country AS customer_country FROM orders o INNER JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id WHERE o.total_eur > 100 AND o.updated_at >= date_trunc('month', now()) - interval '1 month' AND o.updated_at < date_trunc('month', now());
